name: CLOCK (PinkDeveloper)
description:
What you can do in this game?

In this game you can look at the time or you can do experiment.

What types of clock are in the game?

There are 3 types of clocks.

  1. Minimal - Really basic clocks (minutes, hours)
  2. Classic - Minimal with seconds
  3. Expert - Lots of types (part of year, milliseconds ...)

What i need to control this game?

Everything you need is  a mouse. 

If you click on the clock you can hide/unhide the Control Panel
